segway.text1: Have fun in a different way is in your hands. Enjoy hours of route for nature with these fantastic devices. In all routes will be a guide.
segway.text2: The tours last between two and three hours. For longer routes look pricing table.
segway.text3: It is recommended to wear gloves.
segway.maxim: * The groups must be at least 6 people and maximum of 35.
segway.antelacio: * Reservations must be made 15 days in advance.
